name: Pending Purchase Orders
query:
select 
	po.name as "PO No:Link/Purchase Order:120",
	po.transaction_date as "PO Date:Date:100",
	poi.schedule_date as "Sch Date:Date:100",
	po.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:180",
	poi.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
	poi.qty -ifnull(poi.received_qty,0) as "Pending Qty:Float:70",
	poi.qty as "Qty:Float:70",
	poi.received_qty as "Received Qty:Float:70",
	poi.uom as "UoM::30",
	poi.base_rate as "Price:Currency:100",
	poi.description as "Description::300",
	po.per_received as "%%PO Completed:Float:80"

from
 `tabPurchase Order` po, `tabPurchase Order Item` poi
where
 poi.`parent` = po.`name`
 and po.docstatus = 1
 AND po.status != "Closed"
 and po.transaction_date <= curdate()
 and ifnull(poi.received_qty,0) < ifnull(poi.qty,0)
order by poi.schedule_date asc
